import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-homework043', templateUrl: './homework043.component.html', styleUrls: ['./homework043.component.css'], }) export class Homework043Component { showPassword = false; secretPassword = 'tuna'; clickNumber = 0; log = []; displayDetails() { /* this.showPassword ? (this.showPassword = false) : (this.showPassword = true); this.clickMax = [this.clickNumber++]; */ this.showPassword = !this.showPassword; this.log.push(this.log.length + 1); /* this.clickMax.forEach((element) => { console.log(element); }); */ /* console.log(this.clickMax); */ } }
